MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:51pm due to a safety concern with the underground cable network on Braefoot Terrace and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:25 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021.
